user.title: Set up Simple Chores
user.description:
Simple Chores will use the configuration file located at `{config_file}`.

If the file doesn't exist yet, create it with your chore definitions. See the [documentation](https://github.com/chrispyduck/simple_chores) for help.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is allowed.

init.title: Simple Chores Options
init.description:
Simple Chores uses the configuration file at `{config_file}`.

Edit this file to add, remove, or modify chores. Changes will be detected automatically.
